name: Dangerous Bullets (itch)
description:
Dangerous Bullets is a hardcore dynamic platformer that challenges you.
You get the role of a " lone patron” who is forced to fight evil alone.
The world is plunged into chaos, you are the only survivor. You need to
overcome the most dangerous path, arm yourself with the best weapons and take
everything in your power to stop the evil.

Feature of game:
- Most dangerous bosses
- Various weapon
- Various locations
- Lots of monsters
